original: ekahastamite kuṇḍe vedāgninayanāṅgulāḥ | kuṇḍe dvihaste tā
analyzed: eka hasta mite kuṇḍe veda agni nayana aṅgulāḥ kuṇḍe dvi haste tā
jñeyāḥ rasa veda guṇa aṅgulāḥ

original: caturhaste tu kuṇḍe tā vasutarkayugāṅgulāḥ | kuṇḍe rasakare
analyzed: catur haste tu kuṇḍe tāḥ vasu tarka yuga aṅgulāḥ kuṇḍe rasakare
tāḥ tu daśa aṣṭa artha aṅgula anvitāḥ
vasu hasta mite kuṇḍe manu paṃkti aṣṭaka aṅgulāḥ daśa hasta mite
kuṇḍe manu bhāna daśa aṅgulāḥ
vistāra upsedhataḥ jñeyāḥ mekhalāḥ tantra vedibhiḥ divya sārasvate
granthe mānam uktam itas nyathā

original: p. 150) sāttvikī mekhalā pūrvā sonnatā dvādaśāṅgulaiḥ |
analyzed: sāttvikī mekhalā pūrvā sa unnatā dvādaśa aṅgulaiḥ

tṛtīyā tāmasī proktā mekhalā catur aṅgulā
pṛthak vistāram etāsu catur aṅgula mānataḥ  /
prāk agni yāmya kuṇḍānām proktā yoniḥ udak mukhā dakṣa sthā
pūrva yāmye tu jala sthā paścima uttare
navamasya api kuṇḍasya yoniḥ dakṣiṇa diś sthitā śeṣāṇām
prāc mukhā proktā ityādau evam pratīyate

original: yinikuṇḍe yonimabjakuṇḍe nābhiṃ ca varjayet | prāgagnītyādi
analyzed: yinikuṇḍe yonim abjakuṇḍe nābhim ca varjayet prāk agni ityādi
yat proktam sa avakāśam tat anyatas

original: tathāhi caturasrasya sarvāsvāśāsu bodhanāt | sarvārtha sādhakaṃ
analyzed: tathā hi caturasrasya sarvāsu āśāsu bodhanāt sarva artha sādhakam
yasmāt catur asram udāhṛtam
mekhalā madhyatas yoniḥ kuṇḍasya ardha aṃśa mānataḥ āyatā
vistṛtā tri aṃśaiḥ caturviṃśa aṃśa mānataḥ

original: unnatā tāvadaṃśena kṛtāgrā kuṇḍa madhyataḥ | praviṣṭeveti
analyzed: unnatā tāvat aṃśena kṛtāgrā kuṇḍa madhyataḥ praviṣṭā iva iti
vakra agrā jina aṃśa kṛta mekhalā
mekhalā artham pṛthak bhūmiḥ na grāhyā kintu madhyatas
yoni kṣetrasya saṃgrāhyā mūle kumbha dvaya upamā
agre saṃkocam āpannā yat vā aśvattha dala ākṛtiḥ
muṣṭi aratni eka hastānām kuṇḍānām athavā bhavet
yoni agram kuryāt īṣat adhomukham
ekaika aṅgulataḥ yonim kuṇḍeṣu anyeṣu vardhayet
yava dvaya krameṇa eva tad agram api vardhayet  /
yoneḥ antar vilam sruc vat ghṛtasya kṣaraṇa kṣamam sthalāt ārabhya
nālam syāt yoni mūlasya dhāraṇam
nāla mekhalayoḥ madhye paridheḥ sthāpanāya ca randhram
kuryāt tathā vidvān dvitīya mekhalā upari
kuṇḍānām kalpayet antar nābhim ambuja sannibhām
tad tad kuṇḍa anurūpām vā mānam asya syāḥ nigadyate
kuṇḍa arkka aṃśa samucchrāyā kuṇḍa aṣṭa aṃśaiḥ ca vistṛtā
tāvadbhiḥ āyatā api aṃśaiḥ na abhiḥ uktā manīṣibhiḥ
muṣṭi aratni eka hastānām athavā utsedha tāvataḥ netra veda aṅgula upetā
kuṇḍeṣu anyeṣu vardhayet
yava dvaya krameṇa eva nābhim pṛthak udāra dhīḥ nābhi kṣetram

original: tridhā kṛtvā madhye kṛtvā tu karṇikām || 43 ||
analyzed: tridhā kṛtvā madhye kṛtvā tu karṇikām
bahis aṃśa dvayena aṣṭau dalāni parikalpayet patra agrāṇi tatas
kuryāt sampūrṇam kuṇḍa lakṣaṇam
atra āhuti anusāreṇa kuṇḍa lakṣaṇam īritam muṣṭi māna mitam
kuṇḍam śata ardhe saṃpracakṣate
śata homa iratni mātram hasta mātram sahasrake dvi hastam ayute lakṣe
catur hastam udīritam
ṣaṣ hastam daśa lakṣe ca koṭyām aṣṭa karam smṛtam
eka hasta mitam kuṇḍam eka lakṣe vidhīyate
lakṣāṇām daśakam yāvat tāvat hastena vardhayet
daśa lākṣāt ca ā koṭeḥ daśa hastam vidhīyate
saṃkhyā mitāt homāt na asti homa udhika uparaḥ
daśa hasta mitāt kuṇḍāt na kuṇḍam tu adhikam bhavet  /
puraṣkriyā ādau sarvatra caturasram prayojakam yatas tat uktam
sarveṣām sarva siddhi karam budhaiḥ
api yoni ādi kuṇḍānām prasaṅgāt eva kīrttanam dvi hasta ādiṣu
kuṇḍeṣu kecid āhuḥ iha ulvaṇāḥ

original: dvihastādimitaṃ brahmasūtraṃ kṛtvā dvikoṇake | vidhāya tatra
analyzed: dvi hasta ādi mitam brahmasūtram kṛtvā dvi koṇake vidhāya tatra
yoni ādi kuṇḍāni anyāni kārayet

original: katihastā tviyaṃ śāletyevaṃ praśne kṛte paraḥ | āheyaṃ
analyzed: kati hastā tu iyam śālā iti evam praśne kṛte paraḥ āha iyam
daśa hastā iti laukikam hi nidarśanam
tat asat dvi karam kuṇḍam ityādau tad adarśanāt
ākāṃkṣā virahāt eva tu adhyāhāraḥ na yujyate
daśa hasta iti yat ca uktam prastāvāt tat tathā ucyate dvi hastam ayute
kuṇḍam ityādau na eva dṛśyate
prastāvaḥ āyateḥ vā api vistārasya athavā tatas dvi hastam
kuṇḍam ityādiḥ upadeśaḥ yam ucyate
kintu kṣetra phalasya eva dvaiguṇyāt yavadhāryate iti asmad sammataḥ
pakṣaḥ tad prakāraḥ atha kathayate
hasta kṣetre caturviṃśati aṅgulam madhya sūtrakam aṅgulāni
trayastriṃśat yava saptaka saṃyutāḥ

original: catasrastu tathā yūkāḥ sārdhaṃ likhyācatuṣṭayam | dvihaste
analyzed: catasraḥ tu tathā yūkāḥ sārdham likhyā catuṣṭayam dvi haste
madhya sūtre tu mānam evam tri hastake
tad mānam aṅgulān ekacatvāriṃśat catur yavāḥ
yūkā catuṣṭayam kiñcid ūnam likhyā catuṣṭayam catuṣkare
ca aṣṭa catvāriṃśat aṅgulakam ca tat
aṅgulāni tripañcāśat vilikhya ūnāḥ ca ṣaṭ yavāḥ pañca haste tu
tad mānam ṣaṣ kare kṣetre ucyate
tad mūlam aṣṭapañcāśat aṅgulāni ca ṣaṭ yavāḥ
catur yavaiḥ sākam triṣaṣṭiḥ ca aṅgulāni api

original: aṅgulāni tathā saptaṣaṣṭiḥ saptayavāḥ punaḥ | kiñcidūnā
analyzed: aṅgulāni tathā saptaṣaṣṭiḥ sapta yavāḥ punar kiñcid ūnā
madhya sūtram aṣṭa hastasya tu ucyate  /

original: dvāsaptatiraṅgulāni mūlaṃ navakare matam | dasahastamite kuṇḍe
analyzed: dvāsaptatiḥ aṅgulāni mūlam nava kare matam dasa hasta mite kuṇḍe
tad mūlam madhya sūtrakam vardhayet pañcasaptatyā aṅgulaiḥ
sapta yavaiḥ tathā
alpa adhikābhyām sākam evam prakīrttitam
ati yatnena kuṇḍāni dvi kara ādīni kalpayet
nirmāṇam durghaṭam yasmāt dvi hasta ādi svarūpiṇām
kuṇḍasya rūpam jānīyāt paramam prakṛteḥ vapuḥ
prācyām śiraḥ samākhyātam bāhu udakṣiṇa saumyayoḥ udaram
kuṇḍam iti uktam yoniḥ pādau tu paścime

original: aṣṭādaśa syuḥ saṃskārāḥ kuṇḍānāṃ tatra deśitāḥ |
analyzed: aṣṭādaśa syuḥ saṃskārāḥ kuṇḍānām tatra deśitāḥ
vīkṣaṇam mūlamantreṇa śareṇa prokṣaṇam matam
tena eva tāḍanam darbhaiḥ varmaṇā abhyukṣaṇam astreṇa
khanana uddhārau hṛd mantreṇa prapūraṇam  /
samīkaraṇa mantreṇa varmaṇā abhyukṣaṇam matam kuṭṭanam
heti mantreṇa varma mantreṇa mārjanam
vilepanam kalā rūpa kalpanam tad anantaram tri sūtrīkaraṇam
paścāt hṛdayena arcanam matam
astreṇa vaktrīkaraṇam hṛd mantreṇa kuśaiḥ śubhaiḥ

original: yāge kuṇḍāni saṃskuryāt saṃskāraireti (bhi) rīritaiḥ | athavā
analyzed: yāge kuṇḍāni saṃskuryāt saṃskāraiḥ eti athavā

original: atha hastavitastyādi jñānāya pratipādyate | aṅgulādi vibhāgāya
analyzed: atha hasta vitasti ādi jñānāya pratipādyate aṅgula ādi vibhāgāya
prakāraḥ śāstra bodhitaḥ

original: jālāntaragate bhānau yatsūkṣmaṃ dṛśyate rajaḥ | prathamaṃ tat
analyzed: jāla antara gate bhānau yat sūkṣmam dṛśyate rajaḥ prathamam tat
pramāṇānām trasareṇum pracakṣate
trasareṇuḥ tu vijñeyaḥ yoṣṭau syuḥ paramāṇavaḥ
kṛta muṣṭikaḥ prakoṣṭhaḥ muṣṭī ratniḥ iha ucyate
karaḥ eva kalā aṃśena hīnaḥ ratniḥ udāhṛtaḥ tat uktam
nāma liṅgānām anuśāsana saṃgrahe

original: prakoṣṭho vistṛtakaro hastomuṣṭyā ca baddhayā | saratniḥ
analyzed: prakoṣṭhaḥ vistṛta karaḥ ca baddhayā saratniḥ
syāt aratniḥ sa niḥ kaniṣṭhena muṣṭinā
vastutas parīṣiṣṭa ādeḥ smṛti tvāt smārta karmaṇi
tad ukta maṅgalam vidyāt āgama ukta iṣu karmasu śārada ādi ukta vidhinā
vidyāt hasta ādi lakṣaṇam
pañcarātre tathā ca uktam hasta ādīnām tu lakṣaṇam
ācārya dakṣiṇa kare madhyamāṅgali madhyame parvaṇoḥ antaram
dairghyam mātrā aṅgulam udāhṛtam
dairghya mānena mātrā aṅgulam udāhṛtam
chandogapariśiṣṭe yat aṅgulasya tu lakṣaṇam
aṅguṣṭha aṅgula mānam tu yatra yatra upadiśyate tatra tatra
bṛhat parva granthibhiḥ minuyāt sadā

original: tathā kātyāyanenāpi uktamaṅgula lakṣaṇam | aṅgulasya pramāṇaṃ
analyzed: tathā kātyāyanena api uktam aṅgula lakṣaṇam aṅgulasya pramāṇam

idam api abhiyuktānām vacaḥ sakala sammatam
madhyāṅgalī kūrparayoḥ madhye prāmāṇikaḥ karaḥ  /
ratniḥ aṅguṣṭha parvāṇi saṃkhyāyā ca eka viṃśatiḥ
daśa tu aṅguṣṭha parvāṇi prādeśaḥ parikīrtitaḥ

original: evaṃ vikalpya siddhāntān puraścaraṇa candrikām | kurvatā'traiṣa
analyzed: evam vikalpya siddhāntān puraścaraṇa candrikām kurvatā atra eṣa

original: p. 157) pañcamoṃ'śaḥ sa hastaḥ syāt jināṃśastasya cāṅgulam |
analyzed: pañcamaḥ oṃśaḥ sa hastaḥ syāt jina aṃśaḥ tasya ca aṅgulam

aṅgulam tu bhavet bhānam vitastiḥ dvādaśa aṅgulam tad dvayam

karmaṇām atha sarveṣām kiṣkuḥ eva athavā mataḥ

syāt viduṣām eva nirṇayaḥ
prakalpayet srucam yāge vakṣyamāṇena vartmanā
kāraskareṣu āmalakī palāśa khadireṣu api
śrīparṇā śiṃśapā śīra śākhiṣu ekatamam budhaḥ gṛhītvā

viṃśati aṃśaiḥ bhavet antaḥ vedī taiḥ aṣṭabhiḥ bhavet
eka aṃśena mitaḥ kaṇṭhaḥ sapta bhāga mitam mukham
vedī tri aṃśena vistāraḥ kaṇṭhasya parikīritaḥ
agram kaṇṭha samānam syāt mukhe mārgam prakalpayet
kaniṣṭhā aṅguli mānena sarpiṣaḥ nirgamāya vai
vedī madhye vidhātavyā bhāgena ekena karṇikāḥ vidadhīta
bahis tasyāḥ eka aṃśena abhitas vaṭam
tasya khātam tribhiḥ bhāgaiḥ tarvṛm ardha aṃśataḥ bahis
aṃśena ekena paritas dalāni parikapayet
patrāṇi api khanet etat ūcire kecid

dantī yugma yama aṃśaiḥ syāt aṇḍasya ānāhaḥ īritaḥ
ṣaḍbhiḥ aṃśaiḥ puccha bhāgaḥ vedyāḥ kūrma ākṛtiḥ bhavet

original: haṃsasya vā hastino vā patriṇo vā mukhaṃ likhet | mukhasya
analyzed: haṃsasya vā hastinaḥ vā patriṇaḥ vā mukham likhet mukhasya

original: mātā me kaumudī kiṃ ca pitāpi mama kaumudī | yaśo me kaumudī
analyzed: mātā me kaumudī kim ca pitā api mama kaumudī yaśaḥ me kaumudī
kim ca jīvanam mama kaumudī

original: svagauraveṇa karttavyā nopekṣātra manīṣibhiḥ | manurāha yato
analyzed: sva gauraveṇa karttavyā na upekṣā atra manīṣibhiḥ manuḥ āha yatas
grāhya bālāt api subhāṣitam

original: yuñjānairapi yogibhiḥ parataraṃ nālambhi yatsaṃbhramā- dāloki
analyzed: yuñjānaiḥ api yogibhiḥ parataram nā alambhi yat saṃbhramā
brahma ādibhiḥ daivataiḥ gopīnām
kuca kumbha nirbhara parīrambhāya sambhāvitam vedāntam
pratipāditāya mahase tasmai parasmai namaḥ
maukunde pāda padme sarabhasam adharībhūta cetāḥ purastā
dārāt āliṅgya pāda ambuja yugala rajaḥ gauravam gauraveṇa mātuḥ
pāda aravinda upari luṭhita śirāḥ sa ādaram śūlapāṇeḥ
vidhuḥ iva vidadhe kaumudīm devanāthaḥ
yaḥ tarka tantra ramaṇī kamanīya kāntaḥ govindaḥ eva bhuvane

original: viditaḥ sukīrttiḥ | tasyātmajena racitā khalu kaumudīyaṃ śrī
analyzed: viditaḥ sukīrttiḥ tasya ātmajena racitā khalu kaumudīyam śrī
devanātha vibudhena satām mudeḥ tu
abde lakṣmaṇasenasya viyat śūnya abdhi lakṣite akarot kaumudīm etām
devanāthaḥ jagat hitām
iti śrī tarkapañcānana mahā mahā upādhyāya śrī devanatha kṛtā
mantrakaumudī samāptā
śubham astu śrīḥ astu
